Because WAM products typically manage users they become an authoritative identity source when managing identity across applications, including those in the cloud. The PingFederate ® WAM Integration, Connection Kits, and Connection Services make it easy to integrate with Web Access Management Systems, such as Oracle Access Manager, CA Siteminder, and IBM Tivoli Access Manager. WAM Integration Kit – A prebuilt adapter that allows customers or third party service providers to easily extend PingFederate to Web Access Management systems. Oracle Access Manager Connection Kit - A free, prebuilt integration included with the WAM Integration Kit to accelerate deployment of Ping Identity in Oracle environments. CA Siteminder Connection Services - A fixed price integration service delivered by qualified CA third-party service providers sold and supported by Ping Identity to accelerate deployment in CA environments IBM Tivoli Access Manager Connection Services – A fixed price PingEnable integration service from Ping Identity to accelerate deployment in IBM environments.
